text:
Minimalist and patient,/ Open and vacant,/ Each meeting is a product unto itself

/ A proper/ Experience / With proper/ Engagement.

/ Mind the details.

/ There is an ordered set/ Of implications/ We will enumerate, rank and defuse./ We choose this because/ There are scripted measures/ Of procession.

/ Part ritual, part escape,/ We forsake Malcolm and Theresa./ We absolve ourselves of risky/ Interaction.
